Problem Statement

Subjects Arts Astrophysics Climate Diversity & Equity Earth Planets & Moons Space Exploration Sun Earth's ecosystems heavily rely on sunlight, but imagine an ocean world where chemosynthesis, not photosynthesis, sustains life. Your challenge is to design such a world and its diverse ecosystem, pushing the boundaries of astrobiology beyond traditional Earth-like conditions.
